description:

Sadly, it looks like there won’t be a third season for fans of this particular beloved Netflix series to enjoy. The series, which premiered in 2022, received [...]

title: Netflix Cancels Beloved Series After 2 Seasons

description:
Nostalgia is often a strong factor in what gets remade or revived for today’s audiences. As we move further away from the 1990’s, however, it seems as though that particular decade is being mined for material far more than what we’ve seen in recent years. title: Cult Classic 90’s Sci-Fi Horror Movie Getting A Remake

description:
A new film, following the conclusion of both the Jurassic Park and Jurassic World trilogies, is now on the way. The stand-alone sequel, titled Jurassic World Rebirth, introduces director Gareth Edwards to the long-running blockbuster franchise. Original Jurassic Park and The Lost World: Jurassic Park screenwriter David Koepp returned to pen this new installment. Now [...]

title: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ First Trailer Released
